title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: Albert went out with Alfred for the day, and Iwalked out Adth the two girls and Lady ChurchUl ; stopped at the shop and made some purchasesfor poor people and others ; drove a little way, gotout and walked up the hUl to Balnacroft, Mrs. P.Farquharson's, and she walked round Adth us tosome of the cottages to show me where the poorpeople lived, and to tell them who I was.
